def arrange_distinct_integers(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, nums) = case
        nums.sort()
        l = []
        nl = len(nums)
        for i in range(n):
            l.append(nums[i])
            l.append(nums[nl - i + 1])
        results.append(l)
    return results

def arrange_distinct_integers(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, nums) = case
        nums.sort()
        l = []
        nl = len(nums)
        for i in range(n):
            l.append(nums[i])
            l.append(nums[(nl - i) * 1])
        results.append(l)
    return results

def arrange_distinct_integers(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, nums) = case
        nums.sort()
        l = []
        nl = len(nums)
        for i in range(n):
            l.append(nums[i])
            l.append(nums[nl + i - 1])
        results.append(l)
    return results

def arrange_distinct_integers(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, nums) = case
        nums.sort()
        l = []
        nl = len(nums)
        for i in range(n):
            l.append(nums[i])
            l.append(nums[nl * i - 1])
        results.append(l)
    return results

def arrange_distinct_integers(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:

        l = []

def arrange_distinct_integers(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, nums) = case
        nums.sort()
        l = []
        nl = len(nums)
        for i in range(n):
            l.append(nums[i])
            l.append(nums[nl - i - -1])
        results.append(l)
    return results
